alert.note: Alert for Graves (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Paducah (Southern Illinois and Indiana, Southeastern Missouri and Western Kentucky)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 12:19AM EDT until May 09 at 1:00AM EDT by NWS Paducah
info.description: The National Weather Service in Paducah has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Graves County in western Kentucky... * Until midnight CDT. * At 1118 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Lovelaceville to 7 miles north of Fulgham to near Troy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mayfield, Lynnville, Sedalia, Wingo, Water Valley, Dukedom and Fancy Farm. This includes Interstate 69 in Kentucky between Mile Markers 9 and 30. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
